  • Constructor Details

    • TextView

      public TextView(String filepath, int rowPosition, int columnPosition, int width, int height, boolean active) throws IOException
      Initialize a class View
      Parameters:
      filepath - = filepath of the file in the view
      rowPosition - = row position in the Terminal
      columnPosition - = column position in the Terminal
      width - = width of the view
      height - = height of the view
      active - = if true this view can be edited and read
      Throws:
      IOException

    • updateBorder

      public void updateBorder(int rowPosition, int columnPosition, int width, int height)
      Changes border to right symbol "+" for non-active views "*" for active views
      Parameters:
      rowPosition - = top left corner of view in the Terminal
      columnPosition - = top left corner of view in the Terminal
      width - = width of view
      height - = height of view

    • updateStatusBar

      public void updateStatusBar()
      Updates status bar to correctly display: - filename - amount of lines - amount of characters - is a view active or not - is a view dirty or not (there are changes made to the file which are not yet saved to the file) with an "*" behind the filename - row and column coordinates of cursor
